curl -X CONNECT "https://api.example.com/v1/tunnel" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Proxy-Authorization: Basic cHJveHl1c2VyOnNlY3JldA==" -d '{"targets":[{"host":"service-1.internal","port":443,"metadata":{"env":"prod","tags":["edge","critical"]}},{"host":"service-2.internal","port":8443,"metadata":{"env":"prod","tags":["backup","critical"]}},{"host":"service-3.internal","port":9443,"metadata":{"env":"staging","tags":["test","gateway"]}},{"host":"service-4.internal","port":8080,"metadata":{"env":"dev","tags":["sandbox","analytics"]}},{"host":"service-5.internal","port":9000,"metadata":{"env":"qa","tags":["perf","batch"]}}],"options":{"timeout":45,"retries":5,"compression":true,"payloadSize":524288}}'
